Orc
  • Nov 1, 2022
  • poem
    1. Give me a wish - and I will wish you well
    2. I will give you - a magic spell
    3. I'm in a mood, rather wicked
    4. I seek death - or something like it
    5. Give me your spite
    6. And I will write
    7. Vicious murder, black shit - of Brigid's womb
    8. I will bring a man - to his tomb
    9. Dead things know - buried passions, wrath and thirst
    10. I am the font - Pluto's curse
    11. Liquid of the Mnemosyne
    12. Drink and dream
    13. And all ugly things in your sight
    14. Bitter words I will write

Emotion Exercise
  • Oct 19, 2022
  • prose
  • 2019

I feel a great heaviness about my eyes and tension is jamming needles in my jaw. My arms are all itchy red and swollen up and tension crushes the muscles of my back together. The ground beneath my feet is very heavy and weighs down on me so much. My gut grinds together and my burning parched throat chokes itself.

The Night Ghost
  • Oct 19, 2022
  • poem
  • 2019
  • the-night-ghost
    1. The bungler in the grip of the demon held
    2. To his crypt by strange means is compelled
    3. And sleeping as a corpse in darkness rotting
    4. He dreams forth the red eyed thing
    5. So rises from the sleeper's breath
    6. Comes the Night Ghost - who brings death!

The Slow Rot

    2. lived or died, it's hard to tell
    3. And fires lost away / down to hell
    4. And as wind trow to take / hero's hearth
    5. To slimy lair / past danger's berth
